title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
External field methods- quantum effective action , calculation of effective potential , energy interpretation , symmetries of the effective action ; Operator product expansion- the expansion , renormalization group equations for coefficient functions , spectral function sum rules , deep inelastic scattering
Anomalies- pi^0 decay problem , transformation of the measure the Abelian
anomaly , anomaly free gauge theories ; Two dimensional field theories- the Sine-Gordon model , other integrable theories ; Introduction to Conformal field theories ; Large N theories and 1/N expansion. Methods for solving Einstein s equation , Causal structures , Singularities , Initial value formulation , Asymptotic flatness ; Quantum fields in curved space-time ; Quantum Gravity.
